mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.email, u.password, u.contact, u.nickname, u.parent_role, u.birth_date, u.family_code, u.created_at, IFNULL(COUNT(r.report_seq), 0) AS last_baby FROM user u LEFT JOIN report r ON u.user_id = r.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id ORDER BY last_baby DESC, u.created_at DESC

SELECT CASE WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), birth_date) / 365.25) BETWEEN 0 AND 9 THEN '~10 대' WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), birth_date) / 365.25) BETWEEN 10 AND 19 THEN '10 대' WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), birth_date) / 365.25) BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN '20 대' WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), birth_date) / 365.25) BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN '30 대' WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), birth_date) / 365.25) BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN '40 대' WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), birth_date) / 365.25) BETWEEN 50 AND 59 THEN '50 대' WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), birth_date) / 365.25) BETWEEN 60 AND 69 THEN '60 대' ELSE '70 대~' END AS report_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM user GROUP BY report_type
